Key Match Events: The Grizzlies executed defensively to create the pace they wanted on the offensive end.
Ja Morant was twisting in the air and catching alley-oops.
Jay Huff threw down multiple reverse dunks.
Five players were tied with a team-high 11 points at the end of the third quarter.
Pre-Game Insights: Marcus Smart mentioned that the Grizzlies were known for playing fast and explosive before this season.
Desmond Bane and Ja Morant talked about getting more teammates involved in the game plan after the loss to the Houston Rockets.
Post-Match Reflections: Jaren Jackson Jr. said that being back on the floor with Ja Morant and Desmond Bane was huge for him.
Desmond Bane mentioned that the Grizzlies are not yet at full strength and are expecting more players to contribute soon.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies finished with 38 assists, their most since April 2023.
11 Grizzlies players scored field goals in the game.
Jaren Jackson Jr. was a team-high plus-26 in 23 minutes.
Others: The Grizzlies played in throwback white Vancouver jerseys to commemorate the franchiseâ€™s 30-year anniversary.
The bench is missing several key players, including Luke Kennard and GG Jackson.
